synopsis.text: His friends surround him, yet the protagonist finds himself lost in the tedium of their conversation. His mind frequently drifts, seeking solace in a vivid imaginary world of his own creation. However, these mental escapes prove to be hollow, leaving him yearning for genuine human connection. As he navigates through his own fantasies, he gradually develops an appreciation for the intricacies of conversation and the evolution of relationships. With newfound interest, he decides to fully engage with his friends and the real world. This captivating exploration of the human psyche is brought to life in Naoaki Shibuta's 2010 animation, a testament to the creative prowess of Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation.
